entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
